Ice Aegis

shield (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 420
armor id [armor]: 225 (Ice Aegis)
protection, shield [protshield]: 21
defence [def]: -1
parry [parry]: 8
encumbrance [enc]: 1
resist cold [coldres]: +5
national discount [nationrebate]: #56 MA Caelum - Reign of the Seraphim

Requires 10W to forge (W2)

This shield is made of enchanted ice and its enchantment will increase in power when it is cold and decrease when it is warm. The shield will also protect it wielder from cold.
